metadata.title: CVE-2016-3869 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Broadcom Wi-Fi driver in Android before 2016-09-05 on Nexus 5, Nexus 6,Nexus 6P, Nexus 9, Nexus Player, and Pixel C devices allows attackers togain privileges via a crafted application, aka Android internal bug29009982 and Broadcom internal bug RB#96070.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.

linux-lts-wily: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
